1.1.name: wordpress/wordcamp-lisbon-ribbon
1.1.description:
WordCamp Lisboa 2012 Ribbon. Core foundation from David Gwyer's Plugin Options Starter Kit. This plugin includes 4 ribbons from which you can choose the one that better suits your site.

The ribbons are as following: 2 x Bright Yellow Ribbon (left and right variants) 2 x Dark Grey Ribbon (left and right variants)

Visit http://2012.lisboa.wordcamp.org for more details.
